participant_2.background:
I am a fun-loving parent who enjoys playing sports with my family.
my favorite food is steak cooked well done.
i drive a ford truck.
I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.
I had a quiet Christmas birthday with my family and my boyfriend.

content.text: Hi! Not much, just hanging out with the family. How about you?
Same, but I'm looking for something to do. Do you have any ideas?
I like to watch astronomy documentaries. We could watch one together?
Sure, that sounds great! I love space documentaries.
What's your favorite thing about space?
I love learning about the different planets and stars. I'm also fascinated by black holes.
Me too! Black holes are so mysterious. I'd love to visit one someday.
That would be amazing! I think it would be so cool to see a black hole up close.
I also like watching documentaries about the history of space exploration.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I've never really watched any of those before.
You should! They're really cool. I love learning about all the different space missions that have been sent out.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about space.
